# Course assessment

Students will be assessed on the basis of the following components:

- Drafting of a one-page summary of each session in the first part of the course. Summaries are to be handed in (physicaly or electronically) by the following session at the latest [30% of the grade];

- The presentation of a research paper in the second part of the course. Papers will be presented in small groups (2-4 people, depending on the number of attendants) [30% of the grade];

- Drafting of a research report-like assignment focusing on one of the studies presented in class in the second part of the course [40% of the grade].


A template for the session summary can be found here.


A reference document with the questions for the report assignment can be found here.


The course instructor will upload a one-page summary for each session by the beginning of the following session.
